message: Often I end up with some compiler bug, i.e. method seems to cause segmentation faults in 0.8.10 and similar stuff.
Haven't gotten beyond toying around a little...
You should get the latest Nimrod compiler from github, https://github.com/Araq/Nimrod, your method problems might have been fixed.
I'm not really using it for anything serious, I'm mainly helping with the development of tools for Nimrod. For example I am creating a Nimrod IDE called Aporia. Methods are still buggy.
